explains: v. 使……狂喜；使……着迷；（基督再临时）提送（信徒）升天
wordGroup: go into raptures 欣喜若狂

sentences.en: The children gazed at her in rapture.
sentences.cn: 孩子们欣喜若狂地看着她。

sentences.en: Charles listened with rapture to her singing.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯兴致勃勃地听她演唱。

sentences.en: His speech was received with rapture by his supporters.
sentences.cn: 他的演说受到了其支持者的热烈欢呼。
